title: How many attempts to unlock with PIN on Pixel 3A?
content:
I cant remember PIN on a locked Pixel 3A (Verizon)(I think it has Android 11). It has photos that must be recovered, (no backup)
I have made 75 unsuccessful attempts to enter a PIN and unlock.
How many attempts do I have to get the PIN correct?
Does any commercial unlocking software work? 
Or an data recovery tools after a reset?
